publicwhip.spmotion: S2M-4263 Procedures relating to Crown appointments (lodged on 19 April 2006) Karen Gillon*

S2M-4263 Donald Gorrie on behalf of the Procedures Committee: Procedures relating to Crown appointments—That the Parliament notes the Procedures Committee’s 2nd Report 2006 (Session 2), Procedures relating to Crown appointments (SP Paper 515); endorses its conclusions and recommendations, and agrees that the changes to Standing Orders set out in Annexe A to the report be made with effect from 4 May 2006. Supported by: Karen Gillon
S2M-4263 Withdrawn Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
